    Requests graceful termination of the process (SIGTERM) and immediately returns.

    Blocks until the process terminates.

    Blocks until the process terminates or the timeout is reached.
    Methods in net.sf.jstuff.core.io that return types with arguments of type Processes.ProcessWrapper
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    CompletableFuture<Processes.ProcessWrapper>
    Processes.ProcessWrapper.onExit()
    Returns a future that completes when the process has terminated and any configured stdin/stdout/stderr stream redirection tasks (started by Processes.Builder.start()) have finished.
